text: Eastman is a municipality of about 1700 people, part of the Memphrémagog Regional County Municipality in the Eastern Townships region of Quebec, Canada. ==Demographics== ===Population=== Population trend:Statistics Canada: 1996, 2001, 2006, 2011 census {| class="wikitable" |- ! Census ! Population ! Change (%) |- | 2011 | 1,740 | 9.8% |- | 2006 | 1,585 | 12.9% |- | Merger | 1,404 (+) | 56.3% |- | 2001 | 790 | 11.1% |- | 1996 | 711 | 0.1% |- | 1991 | 710 | N/A |} (+) Amalgamation of the Municipality of Stukely and the Village of Eastman on May 30, 2001. ===Language=== Mother tongue (2011) {| class="wikitable" |- ! Language ! Population ! Pct (%) |- | French only | 1,580 | 91.6% |- | English only | 115 | 6.7% |- | Both English and French | 10 | 0.6% |- | Non-official languages | 20 | 1.2% |} == See also == * List of municipalities in Quebec ==References== ==External links== * Category:Municipalities in Quebec Category:Incorporated places in Estrie
title: Eastman, Quebec
